pr_title: Style guide changes, API updates for android and PDF library replaced

timeline.message:
1.itextPdf replaced with Pdfbox(Added PDFWriter class)
2.Deactivate account api changes
3.Offline sync issue fixes
4.version checker code optimization(Added Version class)
5.Branding changes(images and text changes)
6.Removed unused codes
7.Removed unused string file
8.Removed unwanted commented code
9.Removed unwanted dependencies

timeline.bodyText: why was this added? was it a bug?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Yes, there was a bug in offline scenario, we find it in our internal testing and fixed it.
replies.author: naveenr-btc

timeline.bodyText: we are trying to remove fda logos from the code as much as possible, it would be great if you could change this to a generic one instead
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,15 +4,14 @@
     android:id="@+id/activity_splash"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"
-    android:background="@color/colorPrimary">
+    android:background="@color/white">
 
     <ImageView
         android:layout_width="wrap_content"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content"
         android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
-        android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
-        android:layout_marginBottom="40dp"
-        android:layout_marginRight="40dp"
-        android:background="@drawable/fda_logo1" />
+        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="100dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/fda_logo2" />

replies.bodyText: changed the file name to a generic one
replies.author: naveenr-btc

replies.bodyText: I've started a conversation on our side, let's leave it as is until that's decided

Unless App Name is replaced in a template, let's call it FDA MyStudies for now.

timeline.bodyText:
let's extract the common parameters, such as app_name, website etc, define them on top and use the defined entities across the file to make it a bit simpler for users editing this in future. see https://stackoverflow.com/a/24903097/2150212
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE resources [
  <!ENTITY appname "WhereDat">
  <!ENTITY author "Oded">
]>

<resources>
    <string name="app_name">&appname;</string>
    <string name="description">The &appname; app was created by &author;</string>
</resources>
